data.name: CanvasJsonDragDropFileUploader
data.value: Canvas JSON Drag & Drop File Uploader

data.name: CanvasJsonDragDropFileUploader_Description
data.value: Upload files by drag and drop and output them as JSON.

data.name: DropText_Description
data.value: Text shown inside the drop area.

data.name: MaxFiles_Description
data.value: Maximum number of files that can be selected.

data.name: AllowedFormats_Description
data.value: Comma-separated list of allowed extensions or MIME types (e.g. .pdf,image/*).

data.name: Reset_Description
data.value: Changing this value clears selected files.

data.name: SaveButtonColor_Description
data.value: Hex color used for the rename Save button.

data.name: FilesJson_Description
data.value: JSON array of selected files including base64 content.
